title: Breathe
creator_credit: Yan Wawrzynczak, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Yan Wawrzynczak weaves a moving story about a man, the woman he fell in love with and their child. Over several continents and many years, Wawrzynczak covers the changing seasons of this relationship as the three move in and out of each other’s lives.
creator_credit_for_label: Yan Wawrzynczak, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
